choices.text:
in python make a plot that compares two columns in a dataframe.
import pandas as pd 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
df = pd.read_csv('data.csv') 
x = df['column1'] 
y = df['column2'] 
plt.scatter(x, y) 
plt.title('Comparison of Columns in Dataframe') 
plt.xlabel('Column 1') 
plt.ylabel('Column 2') 
plt.show()
